views.markdown:
This item is now Free. - Fixed issues caused by 2.4

- Fixed a bug where UIAlerts would not color properly in some cases

- Updated for latest Snapchat and WhatsApp releases
Changes: Eclipse 2.3-5

- Fix giant spinner in status bar

PSA: I apologize for the lack of updates. I’ve been dealing with personal and family issues, as well as working to transfer to a new university (I was accepted!) and moving into my new apartment. Therefore, I have not had the time to correctly update Eclipse (or release any new tweaks, for that matter). I promise that I will be back to development starting September, and should have Eclipse fully updated by mid-September. As always, thank you for your continued support (or hatred).

With much love, @fr0st
- Fix Cydia’s Search bar
- Fix for Kik Messenger
- Fix for Facebook Messenger
- UI Bug Fixes

- Cydia Support
- UITableView bug fixes
- Bug fixes for 8.4

Coming Soon: Support for iOS 8.4 Music App
- Updated for Instagram 6.10.0
- Updated for Twitter 6.25.1

- Improved Compatibility Mode to be more accurate,

- New feature: Color picker (with libcolorpicker)
- New feature: Compatibility mode
- New feature: Ability to toggle iMessage and SMS bubble tint
- New feature: Reverse Mode
- Removed auto color replacement (replaced by compatibility mode)
- Fix Viber crashes
- Updated for latest Whatsapp
- Fixed Safari on iPad/iPhone 6+
- Compatible with the latest Snapchat
- Fixed SpringBoard support

- Fix long respring time (Oops.)

- Option to disable keyboard coloring (finally.)
- Fixes snapchat front facing flash (finally.)
- Minor backend improvements

- Winterboard checkmarks are now visible again

- Fixed rare issue in which some devices lagged
- Added option to tint SMS bubbles

- Performance Improvements
- Fixed SMS / iMessage bubble colors
- Fixed issue where alerts would color when tweak was disabled
- Fixed Notification Center Widgets
- Fixed memory leak
- Support for Aria + Other music tweaks
- Improved support for Safari on 6+
- Improved support for Instagram
- Improved support for Kik Messenger
- New feature: Color Springboard Statusbar
- Fixed message bubbles when using white tint

- Partial rewrite
- Improved stability
- Fixed recent buttons in app switcher
- Fixed odd-looking control center
- Fixed strange SMS bubble animations
- Fixed untinted search bars in various apps
- Bug fixes for Safari and Music app (iPad)
- Improvements for auto color replacement
- Improvements for UIAlerts and Action Sheets
- Fixed safari lag
- Fixed rare crash on Settings app
